subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mark Martin will make one final effort next season to win the Nascar championship that has eluded him the past 26 years by driving for Hendrick Motorsports.
snippet: Mark Martin will make one final effort next season to win the Nascar championship that has eluded him the past 26 years by driving for Hendrick Motorsports.
